mission.title: Continuum Mission
mission.description: Use Immortalized Crew to ensure the Continuum stays on the correct path. (Placeholder)

potential_rewards.name: Quantum Energy
potential_rewards.flavor: Quantum--a mortal term for Q energy--is needed in order to retrieve crew. Quantum will regenerate over time, but the Q can only hold so much at a time. Plan your crew retrieval operations in order to make efficient use of this resource. Quantum can be regenerated instantly in exchange for Dilithium.

potential_rewards.name: Dilithium
potential_rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

potential_rewards.name: Legendary Behold
potential_rewards.flavor: A valuable item. Go to the Honor Hall to collect!

quests.name: Control Over Chaos
quests.description: Rescue Smiley O'Brien from the planet surface before Terran Empire and Section 31 agents get to him first.

reward.name: Engineering Seminar Holoprogram Quipment
reward.flavor: It can never hurt to brush up on the basics.

reward.name: Engineering Seminar Holoprogram Quipment
reward.flavor: It can never hurt to brush up on the basics.

quests.name: First Conflict
quests.description: Zefram Cochrane has been transported to the homeworld of the easily offended Kreetassans while on his historic flight. Act quickly to save him!

quests.name: Trust Issues
quests.description: Praetor Sela is the target of an assassin, and believes it is Federation who is attempting to have her deposed. Prevent the situation from escalating.

quests.name: A Tale of Forgotten Lore
quests.description: Lore has beamed aboard your ship, and has begun downloading important information from its computer. Bypass his security lockouts and stop him!

stages.text: Locate Lore's Hideout Aboard the Ship

reward.name: Engineering Seminar Holoprogram Quipment
reward.flavor: It can never hurt to brush up on the basics.

reward.name: Medicine Seminar Holoprogram Quipment
